name: (ENDED) Moonbeam
description: Crowdloan has ended, further contributions (starting from 15:00 UTC 22.11.21) will not receive rewards

name: Astar
description: Astar is the Polkadot-native dApp hub supporting Ethereum, WebAssembly, dApp Staking, and Layer2 solutions

name: Litentry
description: The Litentry Network provides privacy-first, decentralized identity aggregation computing services

name: Clover
description: Clover is a substrate based smart contract platform built for Polkadot, with added support for Ethereum developers to participate in the Polkadot ecosystem

name: Parallel
description: Parallel enables token holders and projects to flexibly and borderlessly put their idle capital to earn interests

name: Crust
description: Crust implements the incentive layer protocol for decentralized storage

name: Manta
description: Manta Network is focused on applying cutting-edge cryptographic constructions such as zkSNARKs to deliver end-to-end privacy guarantees for blockchain apps

name: SubDAO
description: SubDAO Network is a Cross-chain Platform to link DAO and DApp on Polkadot

name: Darwinia
description: Darwinia is a trustless multi-chain bridge hub network designed to become the foundational layer for the next generation of Web3.0 dapps and games

name: SubGame
description: SubGame builds multiple applications through a complete technical architecture

name: Efinity
description: Built with Polkadot, Efinity will serve as the infrastructure for the decentralized, cross-chain Metaverse

name: Ares Protocol
description: Ares protocol is the decentralized cross-chain oracle service protocol in the Polkadot ecosystem

name: Nodle
description: Nodle is a decentralized wireless network, harnessing the power of smartphones to provide a low-cost and secure IoT infrastructure for enterprises, device manufacturers, and smart cities
